Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.http

Class Summary
BaseFilter Base implementation for filters which inject beans on itself using SpringHelper.injectBeans(ServletContext, Object)
ForcedBufferResponse A response wrapper which prevents flushing the buffer until really needed
JspTransactionFilter A filter used to make sure that JSP execution is done within a read-only database transaction
LifecycleListener Listener for context events
LoggedUserFilter Filter that will set a ThreadLocal with the logged user
OncePerRequestFilter A filter which is guaranteed to execute only once per request.
PosWebFilter Filter used to optionally disable the posweb, according to the cyclos.properties
RequestProcessingFilter Filter used to apply the correct character encoding
SanitizedHttpServletRequest  
SanitizerFilter Filter used to apply the correct character encoding
WebServicesTransactionFilter A filter which manages database transactions for web services
